Query.Select: *[System[ (EventID=4624) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 259200000] ]] and *[EventData[ Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-7' and Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-18' and Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-90-0-1' and Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-96-0-0' and Data[@Name='TargetUserSid'] != 'S-1-5-96-0-1' and (Data[@Name='LogonType'] = '2' or Data[@Name='LogonType'] = '3' or Data[@Name='LogonType'] = '7' or Data[@Name='LogonType'] = '10' or Data[@Name='LogonType'] = '11') ]]
